title: CoverAI – Cover Letter & Custom Question Answering Assistant
description: Transform your job applications with AI-generated cover letters tailored to any job description. Upload your profile, paste the JD, and let our AI create compelling cover letters that get you noticed.

title: CoverAI – Cover Letter & Custom Question Answering Assistant (Extension)
description: Supercharge your job applications with our AI-powered cover letter generator extension! Upload your profile, auto-extract job details, and instantly generate a personalized cover letter along with answers to custom questions—without ever leaving your job page.
